00107 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 //  CLASS : sc_fxval_observer
00109 //
00110 //  Abstract base class for fixed-point value type observers;
00111 //  arbitrary precision.
00112 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00113 
00114 class SC_API sc_fxval_observer
00115 {
00116 
00117 protected:
00118     
00119     sc_fxval_observer() {}
00120     virtual ~sc_fxval_observer() {}
00121 
00122 public:
00123 
00124     virtual void construct( const sc_fxval& );
00125     virtual void  destruct( const sc_fxval& );
00126     virtual void      read( const sc_fxval& );
00127     virtual void     write( const sc_fxval& );
00128 
00129     static sc_fxval_observer* (*default_observer) ();
00130 
00131 };
00132 
00133 
00134 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 //  CLASS : sc_fxval_fast_observer

00137 //  Abstract base class for fixed-point value type observers;
00138 //  limited precision.
00139 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00140 
00141 class SC_API sc_fxval_fast_observer
00142 {
00143 
00144 protected:
00145     
00146     sc_fxval_fast_observer() {}
00147     virtual ~sc_fxval_fast_observer() {}
00148

00152     virtual void  destruct( const sc_fxval_fast& );
00153     virtual void      read( const sc_fxval_fast& );
00154     virtual void     write( const sc_fxval_fast& );
00155 
00156     static sc_fxval_fast_observer* (*default_observer) ();
00157 
00158 };
